TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemColors extends System.Object

summary.span: 类的每个属性都是 结构，这种结构是 Windows 显示元素的颜色。

span.span: Each property of the class is a structure that is the color of a Windows display element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过使用的属性实现更好的性能或类，而不是无需创建新的钢笔或画笔基于从值在。Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the or classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from . 例如，如果你想要获取的三维元素的表面颜色画笔，则使用属性，因为它获取的画笔，已存在，而调用构造函数参数值为将创建一个新的画笔。For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the constructor with a parameter value of will create a new brush. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示运算符和类。The following code example demonstrates the operator and the class. 此示例设计用于包含名为的按钮的 Windows 窗体`Button1`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a button named `Button1`. 将以下代码粘贴到你的窗体并将关联`Button1_Click`方法与该按钮`Click`事件。Paste the following code into your form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CharacterRangeExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: A that is the color of the active window's border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序工作区是多文档视图中未被文档占据的区域。The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.

summary.span: 获取 结构，它是选定项的背景色。

span.span: Gets a structure that is the color of the background of selected items.

value.span: 一个 ，它是选定项的背景的颜色。

span.span: A that is the color of the background of selected items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所选的项目可能包含菜单项，以及所选的文本。Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text. 例如，结构也可能用于在列表框中的选定项的背景的颜色。For example, the structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
